verses.verse: And of the <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, they <S%H6213>made<s%> finely <S%H8278>wrought<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6213>place<s%>, and made the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

And they did <S%H7554>beat<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H854>into<s%> thin <S%H6341>plates<s%>, and <S%H7112>cut<s%> it into <S%H6616>wires<s%>, to <S%H6213>work<s%> it in the <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and in the <S%H713>purple<s%>, and in the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and in the fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the skilful <S%H2803>workman<s%>.
They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder-pieces<s%> for <S%H2266>it<s%>, joined together; at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> was it joined <S%H2266>together<s%>.

And the skilfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%>, that was upon <S%H642>it<s%>, wherewith to gird it <S%H4639>on<s%>, was of the same piece and like the work <S%H2091>thereof<s%>; of gold, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>wrought<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, <S%H4142>inclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H6605>graven<s%> with the <S%H6605>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder-pieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, to be <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skilful<s%> <S%H4639>workman<s%>, like the work of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>; of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

It was <S%H7251>foursquare<s%>; they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H3717>double<s%>: a <S%H2239>span<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H2239>thereof<s%>, and a span the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H3717>thereof<s%>, being double.

And they <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>. A <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H124>sardius<s%>, <S%H6357>topaz<s%>, and <S%H1304>carbuncle<s%> was the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>;
and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, an <S%H5306>emerald<s%>, a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>, and a <S%H3095>diamond<s%>;
and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, a <S%H3958>jacinth<s%>, an <S%H7618>agate<s%>, and an <S%H306>amethyst<s%>;

and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, a <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, an <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, and a <S%H3471>jaspar<s%>: they were <S%H4142>inclosed<s%> in <S%H4396>inclosings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4865>settings<s%>.

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> were according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%>, according to their <S%H8034>names<s%>; like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H8034>name<s%>, for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> upon the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> like <S%H1383>cords<s%>, of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.
And they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> wreathen <S%H5688>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> at the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.

And the other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H5688>chains<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>settings<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder-pieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, in <S%H4136>the<s%> forepart <S%H6440>thereof<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them upon the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>, upon the <S%H8193>edge<s%> <S%H5676>thereof<s%>, which was toward the side of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder-pieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4295>underneath<s%>, <S%H4136>in<s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> <S%H5980>thereof<s%>, close by the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> <S%H4605>thereof<s%>, above the skilfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

And they did <S%H7405>bind<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by the <S%H2885>rings<s%> thereof unto the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, that it might be upon the skilfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> might not be <S%H2118>loosed<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>, <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>;

and the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H6310>thereof<s%>, as the hole of a <S%H8473>coat<s%> of <S%H8193>mail<s%>, with a binding round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of <S%H7167>it<s%>, that it should not be rent.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> upon the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and twined <S%H7806>linen<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6472>bells<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> upon the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>;

a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, upon the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H3068>in<s%>; as Jehovah <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3801>coats<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>,

and the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and the <S%H6287>goodly<s%> <S%H4021>head-tires<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and the <S%H8336>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>,

and the <S%H73>girdle<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6731>plate<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> upon it a <S%H4385>writing<s%>, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, <S%H6944>HOLY<s%> TO <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>tied<s%> unto it a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, to <S%H5414>fasten<s%> it upon the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

Thus was <S%H3615>finished<s%> all the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; so did <S%H6213>they<s%>.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, the <S%H168>Tent<s%>, and all its <S%H3627>furniture<s%>, its <S%H7165>clasps<s%>, its <S%H7175>boards<s%>, it <S%H1280>bars<s%>, and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and it <S%H134>sockets<s%>;

and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskins<s%>, and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen<s%>;
the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and the <S%H905>staves<s%> <S%H3727>thereof<s%>, and the mercy-seat;
the <S%H7979>table<s%>, all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H6440>thereof<s%>, and the showbread;

the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H5216>thereof<s%>, even the lamps to be set in <S%H4634>order<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8081>thereof<s%>, and the oil for the <S%H3974>light<s%>;

and the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%>;

the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and its <S%H4345>grating<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, its <S%H905>staves<s%>, and all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>base<s%>;

the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, its <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and its <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, the <S%H4340>cords<s%> <S%H3489>thereof<s%>, and the pins <S%H3627>thereof<s%>, and all the instruments of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>;

the finely <S%H8278>wrought<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place<s%>, and the holy <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.
According to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H5656>work<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3651>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, <S%H6213>and<s%>, behold, they had done <S%H3068>it<s%>; as Jehovah had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, even so had they <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H4872>it<s%>: and Moses blessed <S%H1288>them<s%>.
